Articles.Content:
Why does my ship throttle to 3/4's power automatically? Here are my mods...

KW Rocketry

Kethane

ISA Mapsat

Firespitter

KAS

Kerbal Alarm

LTech Science

Mechjeb

Romfarer Lazor
Mechjeb has a setting in it to limit acceleration or limit speed to terminal velocity, either of which could throttle the ship.

limit speed to terminal velocity

I think it is that. IIRC it is on by default.
yeah i get it even when i dont have mods

Mechjeb has a setting in it to limit acceleration or limit speed to terminal velocity, either of which could throttle the ship.

"Prevent Overheats" and "Prevent jet flameouts" (on a vehicle with jets) will also autothrottle engines.

yeah i get it even when i dont have mods

That's highly unlikely. The stock game won't adjust your throttle setting unless you tell it to via shift, ctrl, or x.

yeah i get it even when i dont have mods
That's highly unlikely. The stock game won't adjust your throttle setting unless you tell it to via shift, ctrl, or x.

It can if you've got a joystick plugged in

I think this has basically been answered in the previous posts, to sum up:

A: You have Mechjeb set to Limit to terminal velocity and/or Prevent Jet flameout.

B: You have a Joystick plugged in with one of the axis' set to throttle.
